ing: 3/4 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
des: "This zesty coleslaw is a nice change from the regular coleslaw. I add even more horseradish for extra zing."
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, creamy salad dressing, horseradish, vinegar, dill weed and sugar. Add coleslaw mix, and stir to coat. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving to blend flavors.
